title: Filter records in the Change Calendar
content:
Filters help you reduce the number of records in a record list.

  1. Select Build > Change > Calendar.
  2. Click the Add filter  button.
  3. From the Select field list, choose the field that you want to be the overall filter criteria. For example, choose Priority to filter records by a specific priority value.
  4. Choose the field value.
  5. Repeat steps 1–4 to add more filter criteria.

Service Management displays only those records that meet the filter criteria. Click  Clear all to remove all filters.
